name: critical-vulnerabilities
description: This will find and alert on critical vulnerabilities.

name: high-vulnerabilities
description: This will find and alert on high vulnerabilities.

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND UnifiedVulnerability WITH jupiteroneVulnScore >= 0.6 AND jupiteroneVulnScore < 0.8

name: recently-updated-critical-or-high-vulnerabilities
description: This will find and alert on recently updated critical or high vulnerabilities.

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND UnifiedVulnerability WITH jupiteroneVulnScore >= 0.6 AND _beginOn > date.now - 7 days

name: critical-or-high-with-recently-changed-epss-score
description: This will find and alert on critical or high vulnerabilities with recently changed EPSS score.

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND UnifiedVulnerability WITH jupiteroneVulnScore >= 0.6 AND epssLastModified > date.now - 7 days

name: critical-or-high-with-large-number-of-occurances
description: This will find and alert on critical or high vulnerabilities with a large number of occurrences.

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND UnifiedVulnerability WITH jupiteroneVulnScore >= 0.6 AS u THAT IS Vulnerability AS v RETURN COUNT(v) AS instanceCount, u HAVING instanceCount > 50
